channel.title: Pi on Aurélien' blog
channel.description: Recent content in Pi on Aurélien' blog

item.title: home surveillance monitored via telegram
item.description: Rationale The raspberry pi has always been appealing to me, but I needed a project to really get involved. After discussing with Eric Koncina who made several great applications with Pis, I decided to go for a home surveillance system. The main objective was to see how often the neighbor cats are coming to our garden, because they are scaring our cat. It’s not a big deal, rather a justification for the pi project.
